survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their experience during the onboarding process for our SaaS product, to identify pain points and opportunities for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall onboarding process for our SaaS product?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the scale is labeled clearly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall onboarding process for our SaaS product?

questions.question_text: Which of the following onboarding resources did you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all resources used.

script.question_text: Which of the following onboarding resources did you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How long did it take you to complete the onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear time range to quantify the onboarding duration.

script.question_text: How long did it take you to complete the onboarding process?

questions.question_text: What was the most helpful part of the onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What was the most helpful part of the onboarding process?

questions.question_text: What challenges did you face during onboarding?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to identify pain points. Encourage honesty.

script.question_text: What challenges did you face during onboarding?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the clarity of the instructions provided during onboarding?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How would you rate the clarity of the instructions provided during onboarding?

questions.question_text: Did you require additional support beyond the provided onboarding materials?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to gauge the need for extra support.

script.question_text: Did you require additional support beyond the provided onboarding materials?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, what type of support did you need?
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with an 'Other' option to capture all support types.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice). Include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, what type of support did you need?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our SaaS product to others based on your onboarding experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for NPS-like measurement.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our SaaS product to others based on your onboarding experience?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the onboarding process?
